attributes.name: NOAA GFS forecast
attributes.description: Weather forecasts from the Global Forecast System (GFS) operated by NOAA NWS NCEP.
attributes.attribution: NOAA NWS NCEP GFS data processed by dynamical.org from NOAA Open Data Dissemination archives.
attributes.forecast_domain: Forecast lead time 0-384 hours (0-16 days) ahead
attributes.forecast_resolution: Forecast step 0-120 hours: hourly, 123-384 hours: 3 hourly

attributes.comment: Presence/absence over the previous 1-6 hours, reset every 6-hour forecast step (00Z, 06Z, 12Z, 18Z).

Minimum over the previous 1-6 hours, reset every 6-hour forecast step (00Z, 06Z, 12Z, 18Z).
Average precipitation rate since the previous forecast step.

This coordinate reference system matches the source data which follows WMO conventions of assuming the earth is a perfect sphere with a radius of 6,371,229m. It is similar to EPSG:4326, but EPSG:4326 uses a more accurate representation of the earth's shape.
Average over the previous 1-6 hours, reset every 6-hour forecast step (00Z, 06Z, 12Z, 18Z).
